00023     // Function which when called req's 3 vars to be defined, not sure what the
00024     // javax.swing. stuff does yet
00025     public TabbedEditor(javax.swing.JTabbedPane jTabbedPane,
00026             javax.swing.JFrame jFrame, javax.swing.JLabel caretPositionLabel) {
00027 
00028         untitledDocCount = 0;
00029         /* It looks like all registerFrame does is set variable jFrameLocal, which
00030          * has undefined scope, to be equal to the variable used to call the
00031          * function. If this is all these are intended to do, should be repl. with
00032          * variable setting of desired scope directly here.
00033          */
00034         // set jFrameLocal to the calling variable, jFrame
00035         registerFrame(jFrame);
00036         // set jTabbedPaneLocal to the calling variable
00037         registerTabbedPane(jTabbedPane);
00038         // set caretPositionLabelLocal to the calling variable
00039         registerCaretPositionLabel(caretPositionLabel);
00040 
00041         // Listen for changes on the called var jTabbedPane and perform a fcn
00042         jTabbedPane.addChangeListener(new javax.swing.event.ChangeListener() {
00043             // Currently appears to do nothing, also, why public?
00044             public void stateChanged(javax.swing.event.ChangeEvent evt) {
00045                 tabbedPaneStateChanged(evt);
00046             }
00047         });
00048 
00049 
00050     }

00066     // TODO add your handling code here:

00070     public void tabIsModified(int tabIndex)
00071             throws ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException {
00072 
00073         if (tabIndex >= tabbedDocumentVector.size() || tabIndex < 0) {
00074             // Creates exception if the position of the caret is outside of the
00075             // size of the document?
00076             throw new ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException(tabIndex);
00077         }
00078 
00079         jTabbedPaneLocal.setTitleAt(tabIndex,
00080                 tabbedDocumentVector.elementAt(tabIndex).getTabTitle() + " *");
00081         tabbedDocumentVector.elementAt(tabIndex).setModifed(true);
00082     }
00083 
00084     public void tabIsNotModified(int tabIndex)
00085             throws ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException {
00086 
00087         if (tabIndex >= tabbedDocumentVector.size() || tabIndex < 0) {
00088             throw new ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException(tabIndex);
00089         }
00090         jTabbedPaneLocal.setTitleAt(tabIndex,
00091                 tabbedDocumentVector.elementAt(tabIndex).getTabTitle());
00092         tabbedDocumentVector.elementAt(tabIndex).setModifed(false);
00093     }

00095     public void addEditorTab(TabbedDocument tabbedDocument) {
00096         jTabbedPaneLocal.addTab(tabbedDocument.getTabTitle(),
00097                 tabbedDocument.generateTab());
00098     }

00100     public void removeEditorTab() {
00101         removeEditorTab(jTabbedPaneLocal.getSelectedIndex());
00102     }
00103 
00104     public void removeEditorTab(int tabIndex)
00105             throws ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException {
00106 
00107         if (tabIndex >= tabbedDocumentVector.size() || tabIndex < 0) {
00108             throw new ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException(tabIndex);
00109         }
00110         jTabbedPaneLocal.removeTabAt(tabIndex);
00111         tabbedDocumentVector.remove(tabIndex);
00112         //Reindex so TabbedDocument indicies match JTabbedPane indicies
00113         for (int i = tabIndex; i < tabbedDocumentVector.size(); i++) {
00114             tabbedDocumentVector.elementAt(i).setTabIndex(i);
00115         }
00116     }

00130     public boolean closeFileInTab(int tabIndex)
00131             throws ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException {
00132 
00133         if (tabIndex >= tabbedDocumentVector.size() || tabIndex < 0) {
00134             throw new ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException(tabIndex);
00135         }
00136 
00137         if (tabbedDocumentVector.elementAt(tabIndex).isModifed()) {
00138             Object[] options = {"Yes", "No", "Cancel"};
00139             int fileOpenDialogResult = JOptionPane.showOptionDialog(jFrameLocal,
00140                     "Do you want to save changes you made to " + tabbedDocumentVector.elementAt(tabIndex).getTabTitle() + "?",
00141                     "Unsaved Changes",
00142                     JOptionPane.YES_NO_CANCEL_OPTION,
00143                     JOptionPane.WARNING_MESSAGE,
00144                     null,
00145                     options,
00146                     options[2]);
00147             switch (fileOpenDialogResult) {
00148                 case JOptionPane.YES_OPTION:
00149                     //"Yes" -- Save and close
00150                     if (saveTab(tabIndex)) {
00151                         removeEditorTab(tabIndex);
00152                         return true;
00153                     } else {
00154                         break;
00155                     }
00156                 case JOptionPane.NO_OPTION:
00157                     //"No" -- Don't save
00158                     System.out.println("Don't Save");
00159                     removeEditorTab(tabIndex);
00160                     return true;
00161                 case JOptionPane.CANCEL_OPTION:
00162                     //cancel
00163                     break;
00164                 }
00165             return false;
00166         } else {
00167             // document is not modified
00168             removeEditorTab(tabIndex);
00169             return true;
00170         }
00171 
00172     }

00201     public void openFileInTab(File file, int tabIndex)
00202             throws ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException {
00203 
00204         // creates a new tab if tabIndex == tabbedDocumentVector.size()
00205         if (tabIndex > tabbedDocumentVector.size() || tabIndex < 0) {
00206             throw new ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException(tabIndex);
00207         }
00208 
00209         fileError errorMessage = fileError.NoError;
00210 
00211         if (file == null) {
00212             //no file selected
00213             errorMessage = fileError.NoError;
00214         } else {
00215 
00216             if (fileIsOpen(file) == false) {
00217                 if (file.canRead()) {
00218 
00219                     String text = readFile(file);
00220 
00221                     if (text == null) {
00222                         errorMessage = fileError.ReadError;
00223                     } else {
00224                         if (file.canWrite() == false) {
00225                             errorMessage = fileError.ReadOnly;
00226                         }
00227 
00228                         // Create a new TabbedDocument
00229                         if (tabIndex == tabbedDocumentVector.size()) {
00230                             //create a new tab
00231                             tabbedDocumentVector.addElement(
00232                                     new TabbedDocument(file, this,
00233                                     tabIndex));
00234                             addEditorTab(tabbedDocumentVector.lastElement());
00235 
00236                         } else {
00237                             //use an already existing tab
00238                             tabbedDocumentVector.setElementAt(
00239                                     new TabbedDocument(file, this, tabIndex),
00240                                     tabIndex);
00241                         }
00242 
00243                         // Ensure the new tab is active
00244                         jTabbedPaneLocal.setSelectedIndex(tabIndex);
00245 
00246                         tabbedDocumentVector.elementAt(tabIndex).
00247                                 getTextPane().setText(text);
00248 
00249                         tabIsNotModified(tabIndex);
00250 
00251 
00252                         //new
00253                         // Ensure the new tab is active
00254                         jTabbedPaneLocal.setSelectedIndex(
00255                                 tabbedDocumentVector.lastElement().
00256                                 getTabIndex());
00257 
00258                         tabbedDocumentVector.lastElement().getTextPane().
00259                                 setText(text);
00260 
00261                         tabIsNotModified(tabbedDocumentVector.lastElement().
00262                                 getTabIndex());
00263 
00264 
00265                         //active
00266                         int selectedIndex = jTabbedPaneLocal.getSelectedIndex();
00267 
00268 
00269                     }
00270 
00271                 } else {
00272                     // Cannot read file
00273                     errorMessage = fileError.ReadError;
00274                 }
00275             } else {
00276                 //file is open
00277                 if (tabbedDocumentVector.elementAt(jTabbedPaneLocal.getSelectedIndex()).getFile().equals(file) &&
00278                         tabbedDocumentVector.elementAt(jTabbedPaneLocal.getSelectedIndex()).isModifed() == false) {
00279                     // file is open in active tab and active tab is unmodified
00280                     //ok to re-open file
00281                     errorMessage = fileError.NoError;
00282 
00283                 } else {
00284                     errorMessage = fileError.FileIsOpen;
00285                 }
00286             }
00287         }
00288         switch (errorMessage) {
00289             case ReadError:
00290                 JOptionPane.showMessageDialog(jFrameLocal,
00291                         "Error reading from file.",
00292                         "File Read Error",
00293                         JOptionPane.ERROR_MESSAGE);
00294                 break;
00295             case ReadOnly:
00296                 JOptionPane.showMessageDialog(jFrameLocal,
00297                         "The selected file \"" + file.getName() +
00298                         "\" is marked as read only. \n " +
00299                         "Any changes made to this file must be saved " +
00300                         "using a new file name.",
00301                         "Read Only",
00302                         JOptionPane.INFORMATION_MESSAGE);
00303                 break;
00304             case FileIsOpen:
00305                 Object[] options = {"Yes", "Cancel"};
00306                 int fileOpenDialogResult = JOptionPane.showOptionDialog(jFrameLocal,
00307                         "Warning: This file is already open.\n " +
00308                         "Do you want to revert to the saved version? " +
00309                         "(All unsaved changes will be lost.)",
00310                         "File Already Open",
00311                         JOptionPane.OK_CANCEL_OPTION,
00312                         JOptionPane.WARNING_MESSAGE,
00313                         null,
00314                         options,
00315                         options[1]);
00316                 switch (fileOpenDialogResult) {
00317                     case JOptionPane.OK_OPTION:
00318                         //"Yes" -- Revert
00319                         int index = getIndex(file);
00320                         removeEditorTab(index);
00321                         openFileInNewTab(file);
00322                         System.out.println("Revert");
00323                         break;
00324                     case JOptionPane.CANCEL_OPTION:
00325                         //"Cancel"
00326                         System.out.println("Cancel");
00327                         break;
00328                 }
00329                 break;
00330             case NoError:
00331                 break;
00332         }
00333 
00334     }

00336     private File openFileDialog() {
00337 
00338         JFileChooser fc = new JFileChooser();
00339         fc.setCurrentDirectory(new File("."));
00340 
00341         int result = fc.showOpenDialog(jFrameLocal);
00342 
00343         if (result == JFileChooser.CANCEL_OPTION) {
00344             return null;
00345         } else if (result == JFileChooser.APPROVE_OPTION) {
00346             return fc.getSelectedFile();
00347         } else {
00348             return null;
00349         }
00350     }
00351 
00358     public int getIndex(File file) {
00359         //Returns -1 if the file is not currently open in a tab
00360 
00361         int index = -1;
00362         for (int i = 0; i < tabbedDocumentVector.size(); i++) {
00363             if (tabbedDocumentVector.elementAt(i).getFile() != null) {
00364                 if (tabbedDocumentVector.elementAt(i).getFile().equals(file)) {
00365                     index = i;
00366                 }
00367             }
00368         }
00369         return index;
00370     }
00371 
00379     public boolean fileIsOpen(File file) {
00380         for (TabbedDocument docIter : tabbedDocumentVector) {
00381             if (docIter.getFile() != null) {
00382                 if (docIter.getFile().equals(file)) {
00383                     return true;
00384                 }
00385             }
00386         }
00387         return false;
00388     }
00389 
00390     public String readFile(File file) {
00391 
00392         StringBuffer fileBuffer;
00393         String fileString;
00394         String line;
00395 
00396         try {
00397             FileReader in = new FileReader(file);
00398             BufferedReader br = new BufferedReader(in);
00399             fileBuffer = new StringBuffer();
00400 
00401             while ((line = br.readLine()) != null) {
00402                 fileBuffer.append(line + "\n");
00403             }
00404             in.close();
00405             fileString = fileBuffer.toString();
00406         } catch (IOException e) {
00407             e.printStackTrace();
00408             return null;
00409         }
00410         return fileString;
00411     }

00425     public boolean saveTab(int tabIndex) throws ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException {
00426 
00427         if (tabIndex >= tabbedDocumentVector.size() || tabIndex < 0) {
00428             throw new ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException(tabIndex);
00429         }
00430 
00431         File file = tabbedDocumentVector.elementAt(tabIndex).getFile();
00432 
00433         if (file == null) {
00434             // "Untitled" file
00435             return saveAsTab(tabIndex);
00436         }
00437         if (file.canWrite()) {
00438             tabIsNotModified(tabIndex);
00439             return writeFile(file,
00440                     tabbedDocumentVector.elementAt(tabIndex).
00441                     getTextPane().getText());
00442         } else {
00443             // file is read only
00444             Object[] options = {"Save as...", "Cancel"};
00445             int readOnlyDialogResult = JOptionPane.showOptionDialog(jFrameLocal,
00446                     "This file is marked as read only.\n " +
00447                     "Changes must be saved using a different file name.",
00448                     "Read Only",
00449                     JOptionPane.OK_CANCEL_OPTION,
00450                     JOptionPane.QUESTION_MESSAGE,
00451                     null,
00452                     options,
00453                     options[1]);
00454             switch (readOnlyDialogResult) {
00455                 case JOptionPane.OK_OPTION:
00456                     //"Save as..."
00457                     if (saveAsTab(tabIndex)) {
00458                         return true;
00459 
00460                     } else {
00461                         return false;
00462                     }
00463                 case JOptionPane.CANCEL_OPTION:
00464                 //"Cancel"
00465                 default:
00466                     return false;
00467                 }
00468         }
00469 
00470     }

00472     public boolean saveAsActiveTab() {
00473         return saveAsTab(jTabbedPaneLocal.getSelectedIndex());
00474     }
00475 
00484     public boolean saveAsTab(int tabIndex)
00485             throws ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException {
00486 
00487         if (tabIndex >= tabbedDocumentVector.size() || tabIndex < 0) {
00488             throw new ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException(tabIndex);
00489         }
00490 
00491         // Show the tab that is going to be saved
00492         jTabbedPaneLocal.setSelectedIndex(tabIndex);
00493 
00494         JFileChooser fc = new JFileChooser();
00495         fc.setCurrentDirectory(new File("."));
00496 
00497         int result = fc.showSaveDialog(jFrameLocal);
00498 
00499         if (result == JFileChooser.CANCEL_OPTION) {
00500             return false;
00501         } else if (result == JFileChooser.APPROVE_OPTION) {
00502             File file = fc.getSelectedFile();
00503 
00504             if (file.exists()) {
00505                 int response = JOptionPane.showConfirmDialog(null,
00506                         "Overwrite existing file?",
00507                         "Overwrite?", JOptionPane.OK_CANCEL_OPTION,
00508                         JOptionPane.QUESTION_MESSAGE);
00509 
00510                 if (response == JOptionPane.CANCEL_OPTION) {
00511                     return false;
00512                 }
00513             }
00514 
00515             if (writeFile(file,
00516                     tabbedDocumentVector.elementAt(tabIndex).
00517                     getTextPane().getText())) {
00518 
00519                 tabbedDocumentVector.elementAt(tabIndex).setFile(file);
00520                 tabbedDocumentVector.elementAt(tabIndex).setTabTitle(file);
00521                 tabIsNotModified(tabIndex);
00522                 return true;
00523             }
00524             //write failed for some reason
00525             return false;
00526         } else {
00527             //file chooser returned without "Cancel" or "OK"
00528             return false;
00529         }
00530     }
00531 
00532     private boolean writeFile(File file, String dataString) {
00533         try {
00534             PrintWriter out =
00535                     new PrintWriter(new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter(file)));
00536             out.print(dataString);
00537             out.flush();
00538             out.close();
00539         } catch (IOException e) {
00540             e.printStackTrace();
00541             return false;
00542         }
00543         return true;
00544     }

00546     //New files
00553     // called by EditorGUI.java
00554     public void createNewFile() {
00555 
00556         untitledDocCount++;
00557 
00558         tabbedDocumentVector.addElement(
00559                 new TabbedDocument(null, this,
00560                 tabbedDocumentVector.size()));
00561 
00562         addEditorTab(tabbedDocumentVector.lastElement());
00563 
00564         // Ensure the new tab is active
00565         jTabbedPaneLocal.setSelectedIndex(
00566                 tabbedDocumentVector.lastElement().getTabIndex());
00567 
00568         tabbedDocumentVector.lastElement().getTextPane().setText("");
00569 
00570         tabIsNotModified(tabbedDocumentVector.lastElement().getTabIndex());
00571     }

00577     private int untitledDocCount = 0;
